title: Multispectral Drone Data Analysis on Coastal Dunes
abstract: We devise a method to study coastal dune vegetation based on drone data orthomosaic mapping and machine learning algorithms to distinguish objects with spatial and color accuracy from numerous high-quality drone multispectral images. It allows accurate surveying on the density of coastal dune vegetation and potentially individual species. We thus analyze big data to develop tools for coastal resiliency and sustainability.
venue: 2021 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)

journal.name: 2021 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)
